title: Dinnerbone: 玩家将可以被其他实体推动
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2015-9-1 16:42 编辑 


（上图需要倒序来看）
Dinnerbone: Controversial change: Players collide with things again.
Dinnerbone: 有争议性的改动：玩家又可以被别的东西推动了。http://gfycat.com/TemptingThriftyBoar
Dinnerbone: For every feature we'd make an option, we exponentially create more work developing & testing every option with & against every other option
Dinnerbone: 为每一个特性我们会做出选择，我们需要进行指数级增长的开发工作&测试每一个选择&与不同的意见对抗
Dinnerbone: So that's why we don't make things an option just because some people didn't like it. Sorry! :(
Dinnerbone: 所以这是为什么我们不作出选择，因为有人不喜欢它。抱歉！ :(

（23MB GIF，较慢，可以点击链接查看）

http://gfycat.com/TemptingThriftyBoar

replies.author: locationiskey
replies.txt_content:
make an option应该是指做一个开关/选项
所以
So that's why we don't make things an option just because some people didn't like it.
意思是
这就是我们不会因为某些人不喜欢它就把它做成一个可选项的原因
